2.Name: ADS
2.Description: UK-based service specializing in the preservation and dissemination of archaeological research data.

3.Name: SND
3.Description: Sweden's national platform for managing and sharing research data across various disciplines.

4.Name: Nara Research Institute
4.Description: Japanese research center dedicated to the preservation and study of cultural heritage and archaeological discoveries.
4.Full name: Nara National Research Institute for Cultural Properties

5.Name: Digital Antiquity
5.Description: US-based organization managing tDAR, a database focused on the digital preservation of archaeological archives and cultural resources.
5.Full name: Digital Antiquity (The Digital Archaeological Record - tDAR)

6.Name: CONICET
6.Description: Argentina's leading research organization, supporting various scientific disciplines, including archaeology.
6.Full name: National Scientific and Technical Research Council

7.Name: SEAD
7.Description: A Swedish national resource for environmental archaeology data.

8.Name: AIS-CR
8.Description: National archaeological database and information system of the Czech Republic.
8.Full name: Archaeological Information System of the Czech Republic
8.Provider: Institute of Archaeology, Czech Academy of Sciences

9.Name: Inrap
9.Description: France's leading institution for preventive archaeology, responsible for safeguarding the nation's archaeological heritage.
9.Full name: Institut national de recherches archéologiques préventives

10.Name: DOAJ
10.Description: An online directory that indexes and provides access to high-quality, open-access, peer-reviewed journals.

11.Name: BASE
11.Description: One of the world's largest search engines for academic web resources, especially for open-access content.

12.Name: DNB
12.Description: The German National Library, responsible for collecting and preserving all German-language publications.

13.Name: RECYT
13.Description: Spanish repository for science and technology, managed by FECYT, providing access to scientific data and publications.
13.Full name: Repositorio Español de Ciencia y Tecnología
13.Provider: FECYT (Fundación Española para la Ciencia y la Tecnología)

14.Name: Isidore
14.Description: A platform providing access to digital data in humanities and social sciences.
14.Full name: Integration Services, interconnection of Data of the Research and Education

15.Name: EKT
15.Description: Greece's National Documentation Centre, responsible for archiving and providing access to a wide range of scientific and cultural resources.
15.Full name: Εθνικό Κέντρο Τεκμηρίωσης & Ηλεκτρονικού Περιεχομένου (National Documentation Centre of Greece)

16.Name: HRCAK
16.Description: The central Croatian portal for open-access scientific journals.
16.Full name: HRCAK Portal of Scientific Journals of Croatia

17.Name: OpenEdition
17.Description: A French open-access platform for journals, books, and research blogs in the humanities and social sciences.
17.Provider: OpenEdition (CLEO - Centre for Open Electronic Publishing)

18.Name: COIMBRA/Pombolina
18.Description: Portugal's University of Coimbra's digital library providing access to academic and scientific documents.

19.Name: CLARIN
19.Description: European research infrastructure providing access to language resources and technology.
19.Full name: Common Language Resources and Technology Infrastructure

20.Name: CESSDA
20.Description: European research infrastructure providing access to data in the social sciences.
20.Full name: Consortium of European Social Science Data Archives

21.Name: ZRC SAZU
21.Description: Slovenia’s leading research institute in the humanities and social sciences.
21.Full name: Znanstvenoraziskovalni center Slovenske akademije znanosti in umetnosti (Research Centre of the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts)

22.Name: Econstor
22.Description: A platform providing open-access publications in economics.
22.Provider: ZBW – Leibniz Information Centre for Economics

23.Name: OpenAIRE
23.Description: A European infrastructure supporting open access to research outputs and fostering open science.
23.Full name: Open Access Infrastructure for Research in Europe

24.Name: Biblioteka Nauki
24.Description: A Polish platform providing open access to scientific publications in various fields.
24.Provider: Interdisciplinary Centre for Mathematical and Computational Modelling (ICM), University of Warsaw

25.Name: DH Publications (dblp)
25.Description: A bibliography for computer science publications, indexing research papers from various sources.
25.Provider: Schloss Dagstuhl – Leibniz Center for Informatics

26.Name: CLARIN Resource Families
26.Description: Provides access to language resources, categorized into families for easier search and discovery.

27.Name: TAPoR
27.Description: A portal offering tools and resources for text analysis, designed for humanities scholars.

28.Name: SSK Zotero Resources
28.Description: A collection of Zotero-based resources to assist with standardization in research.

29.Name: Humanities Data
29.Description: A platform for accessing various data sets in the humanities.

30.Name: The Programming Historian
30.Description: Offers tutorials and resources for digital tools and techniques in historical research.

31.Name: DARIAH Campus
31.Description: A platform offering open educational resources for digital humanities research.

32.Name: CESSDA (trainings)
32.Description: Provides access to training resources for social science data archives.

33.Name: Language Resource Switchboard
33.Description: Tool for processing and analyzing language resources by linking them to relevant tools.

34.Name: Standardisation Survival Kit
34.Description: Provides resources for understanding and implementing standards in social sciences and humanities research.

35.Name: EOSC Catalogue
35.Description: Previously provided access to services and resources from the European Open Science Cloud.

36.Name: SSHOC Service Catalogue
36.Description: Previously provided services for research in the social sciences and humanities.

37.Name: DARIAH contribution tool
37.Description: Previously facilitated in-kind contributions to the DARIAH research infrastructure.

38.Name: ARCHE

38.Provider: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage (ACDH-CH)

39.Name: BAS
39.Description: Provides access to speech signal data from various research projects.

40.Name: BBAW
40.Description: A research institute providing access to linguistic and historical resources.
40.Full name: Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences and Humanities

54.Name: COCOON

55.Name: CNC

56.Description: A repository for digital humanities resources as part of the DARIAH-DE initiative.

57.Description: Provides a repository for storing and sharing research data, with a focus on social sciences and humanities.

59.Description: Provides access to language resources and tools, with a focus on minority languages.

60.Name: HZSK
60.Description: Offers access to language corpora and linguistic research data.

61.Description: Focuses on research in computational linguistics and speech processing.

62.Name: INT

63.Name: LINDAT/CLARIAH-CZ
63.Description: Provides language technology and digital humanities tools.

64.Description: Offers access to linguistic resources, particularly for endangered languages.

65.Full name: Leibniz Institute for Educational Media | Georg Eckert Institute

66.Name: IDS Mannheim
66.Description: Provides access to resources on the German language.

85.Name: B2SHARE

88.Name: ELRA

92.Description: Offers linguistic data resources for research in language technology, speech processing, and machine learning.

99.Name: Conversion Hub
